definition: to outline/to summarize/to sketch/summary/brief description/concise narrative/in a nutshell/briefly
simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)

sentences.english: This article describes briefly the preparation technology and the main performance of waterborne high temperature anticorrosion coatings.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了水性高溫防腐塗料的製備工藝及主要性能。

sentences.english: It introduces the motion requirement and the structural characters of yawing and variable pitch.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了偏航和變槳距系統結構特點和動作要求。

sentences.english: Let me go over these three themes.
sentences.chinese: 我先簡述一下這三個主題。

sentences.english: Making new progress on the research for foreland basin is outlined.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了國外前陸盆地研究的新進展。

sentences.english: The article discusses several requests on the style and charcter of worsted goods.
sentences.chinese: 本文簡述了毛織物的風格及特徵的幾點基本要求。

sentences.english: The process of polyvinyl butyral (PVB)was briefly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了聚乙烯醇縮丁醛生產的工藝流程。

sentences.english: Studies of blue honeysuckle(Lonicera caerulea L. ) were briefly reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了藍靛果忍冬種質資源的研究進展。

sentences.english: He prefaced the diaries with a short account of how they were discovered.
sentences.chinese: 他給這本日記寫了序言，簡述日記發現的經過。

sentences.english: Describe the content modification of national standard for cold heading and cold extruding.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了冷鐓和冷擠壓用鋼國家標準的修訂內容。

sentences.english: In addition, a brief account is also given on the characteristics of fossil bivalve assemblages.
sentences.chinese: 刊出部分化石圖版，簡述雙殼類化石組合特徵。

sentences.english: The principle of FH communication is described.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了跳頻通信的基本原理。

sentences.english: Describe your military service in your home country, giving the time and the unit you belonged to.
sentences.chinese: 簡述你在所屬國家服役的情況，說明時間和所屬部隊。

sentences.english: Regulations on diesel vehicle free accelerating smoke emission around the world are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了世界上一些柴油車自由加速煙度排放法規。

sentences.english: In this article, the working mechanism of DI horizontal vacuum belt filter was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文簡述了移動盤水平真空帶式過濾機的工作原理。

sentences.english: List the main differences between the endotoxin and exotoxin of bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 簡述細菌內毒素和外毒素的主要異同點。

sentences.english: At last, the brief introduction for the mainly genres and styles of lion-dance sports is given.
sentences.chinese: 最後簡述了舞獅運動的主要流派和風格。

definition: to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
